FactDemaAggregator.mainSelect: select a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR , -- 1 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,d.dt_fine_fornitura,data_validita_al),--4 c.operando, --4 decode (c.operando,'ED_LIM_BOP',B.VALORI,'EDPOTDIS00',cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)),'EDPOTCIMP0',cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10)),cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10))), -- 5 cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)), -- 6 b.valori, --7 b.prezzo, --8 c.id_operando --9 from z_anagrafica_operandi c,z_prodotto_operando b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele a,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where c.tipo='DEMA' and a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 24') and b.ctar1=a.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and b.acquisizione= a.cfreq and c.operando=b.operando and b.prodotto='STD_TANDEM' union select a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR , -- 1 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,d.dt_fine_fornitura,data_validita_al),--4 c.operando, --4 decode (c.operando,'ED_LIM_BOP',B.VALORI,'EDPOTDIS00',cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)),'EDPOTCIMP0',cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10)),cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10))), -- 5 cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)), -- 6 b.valori, --7 b.prezzo, --8 c.id_operando --9 from z_anagrafica_operandi c,z_prodotto_operando b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele a,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where c.tipo='DEMA' and a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 24') and b.ctar1=a.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and c.operando=b.operando and b.prodotto='STD_TANDEM' group by a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR , -- 1 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,d.dt_fine_fornitura,data_validita_al),--4 c.operando, --4 decode (c.operando,'ED_LIM_BOP',B.VALORI,'EDPOTDIS00',cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)),'EDPOTCIMP0',cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10)),cast(a.cpot1 as varchar2(10))), -- 5 cast(a.cpota as varchar2(10)), -- 6 b.valori, --7 b.prezzo, --8 c.id_operando

FactDemaExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_DEMA.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_DEMA.TIPO,--5 FACTS_F_DEMA.OPERAND,--6 FACTS_F_DEMA.SAISON,--7 FACTS_F_DEMA.PROG,--8 FACTS_V_DEMA.LEGACY,--9 FACTS_V_DEMA.TIPO,--10 FACTS_V_DEMA.AB,--11 FACTS_V_DEMA.BIS,--12 FACTS_V_DEMA.LMENGE,--13 FACTS_V_DEMA.LMENGE2,--14 FACTS_V_DEMA.TARIFART,--15 FACTS_V_DEMA.KONDIGR,--16 FACTS_V_DEMA.PROG --17 FROM FACTS_KEY, FACTS_F_DEMA, FACTS_V_DEMA WHERE FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = FACTS_F_DEMA.LEGACY AND FACTS_F_DEMA.LEGACY = FACTS_V_DEMA.LEGACY and FACTS_F_DEMA.PROG = FACTS_V_DEMA.PROG order by FACTS_F_DEMA.prog

UDEFAggregator.mainSelect: select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,d.dt_fine_fornitura,data_validita_al),--4 b.id_operando , --5 substr(a.ctar1, 0,10) , --6 substr( a.ctar1, 11) ,(length (a.ctar1)), --7 a.acquisizione --6 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b ,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where a.ctar1=v.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 24') and a.operando = b.operando and tipo = 'USERDEF' and a.acquisizione= v.cfreq and a.prodotto='STD_TANDEM' UNION select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,d.dt_inizio_fornitura,d.dt_fine_fornitura,data_validita_al),--4 b.id_operando , --5 substr(a.ctar1, 0,10) , --6 substr( a.ctar1, 11) ,(length (a.ctar1)), --7 a.acquisizione --6 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b ,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where a.ctar1=v.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 24') and a.operando = b.operando and tipo = 'USERDEF' and a.prodotto='STD_TANDEM'

UDEFExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_UDEF.TIPO, --5 FACTS_F_UDEF.OPERAND, --6 FACTS_F_UDEF.SAISON,--7 FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG, --8 FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY, --9 FACTS_V_UDEF.TIPO,--10 FACTS_V_UDEF.AB, --11 FACTS_V_UDEF.BIS, --12 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL1, --13 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL2,--14 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL3,--15 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL4,--16 FACTS_V_UDEF.TARIFART, --17 FACTS_V_UDEF.KONDGIR, --18 FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG --19 FROM FACTS_KEY,FACTS_F_UDEF,FACTS_V_UDEF WHERE FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY AND FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY = FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY and FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG = FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG order by FACTS_F_UDEF.prog
